goals.description: Implement @switch and @for operators for conditional and iterative control flow
goals.success_criteria: Switch statements and for loops can be executed with dynamic conditions and actions

goals.description: Implement @while and @each operators for loop control and iteration
goals.success_criteria: While loops and each iteration can be executed with conditions and data processing

goals.description: Implement @filter operator for data filtering and transformation
goals.success_criteria: Data can be filtered and transformed based on conditions and patterns
